title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.25 - Definition of adequate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.25 - Definition of adequate

State Regulations

Adequate shall mean sufficient to accomplish the purposes for which something is intended, and to such a degree that no unreasonable risk to health or safety is presented. An item installed, maintained, designed and assembled, an activity conducted or act performed, in accordance with generally accepted standards, principles or practices applicable to a particular trade, business, occupation or profession, is adequate within the meaning of this Subpart. Notes
